title: Preserving Culture through Native Language (California State University, San Marcos)
text: ( Source : California State University, San Marcos ) Dr. Jocelyn Ahlers is not only trying to save the history of California's indigenous people, she's also hoping to help build their future. The Cal State San Marcos professor of linguistics
